00221         inline bool initSACModel(const int modelType) {
00222 
00223                 // Build the model
00224                 switch (modelType) {
00225                 case OBJMODEL_PLANE: {
00226                         cout << "[SAC Segmentation] Using a model of type: OBJECT_MODEL_PLANE"<<endl;
00227                         objectModel = new ObjectModelPlane();
00228                         objectModel->setInputCloud(inputPointCloud);
00229                         break;
00230                 }
00231                 case OBJMODEL_CIRCLE:
00232                 {
00233                         cout << "[SAC Segmentation] Using a model of type: OBJECT_MODEL_CIRCLE"<<endl;
00234                         objectModel = new ObjectModelCircle();
00235                         objectModel->setInputCloud(inputPointCloud);
00236                         break;
00237 
00238                 }
00239                 case OBJMODEL_SPHERE:
00240                 {
00241                         cout << "[SAC Segmentation] Using a model of type: OBJECT_MODEL_SPHERE"<<endl;
00242                         objectModel = new ObjectModelSphere();
00243                         objectModel->setInputCloud(inputPointCloud);
00244                         break;
00245                 }
00246                 case OBJMODEL_LINE:
00247                 {
00248                         cout << "[SAC Segmentation] Using a model of type: OBJECT_MODEL_LINE"<<endl;
00249                         objectModel = new ObjectModelLine();
00250                         objectModel->setInputCloud(inputPointCloud);
00251                         break;
00252                 }
00253                 case OBJMODEL_ORIENTED_LINE:
00254                 {
00255                         //ToDo check the initialization
00256                         cout << "[initSACModel] Using a model of type: OBJECT_MODEL_SPHERE"<<endl;
00257                         objectModel = new ObjectModelOrientedLine();
00258                         objectModel->setInputCloud(inputPointCloud);
00259                         break;
00260                 }
00261                 case OBJMODEL_ORIENTED_PLANE:
00262                 {
00263                         //ToDo check the initialization
00264                         cout << "[SAC Segmentation] Using a model of type: OBJECT_MODEL_PLANE"<<endl;
00265                         objectModel = new ObjectModelOrientedPlane();
00266                         objectModel->setInputCloud(inputPointCloud);
00267                         break;
00268                 }
00269                 case OBJMODEL_PLANE_FROM_LINES:
00270                 {
00271                         //ToDo check the initialization
00272                         cout << "[SAC Segmentation] Using a model of type: OBJECT_MODEL_PLANE_FROM_LINES"<<endl;
00273                         objectModel = new ObjectModelPlaneFromLines();
00274                         objectModel->setInputCloud(inputPointCloud);
00275                         break;
00276                 }
00277                 case OBJMODEL_PLANE_FROM_LINE_AND_POINT:
00278                 {
00279                         //ToDo check the initialization
00280                         cout << "[SAC Segmentation] Using a model of type: OBJECT_MODEL_PLANE_FROM_LINE_AND_POINT"<<endl;
00281                         objectModel = new ObjectModelPlaneFromLineAndPoint;
00282                         objectModel->setInputCloud(inputPointCloud);
00283                         break;
00284                 }
00285                 default: {
00286                         cout << "[initSACModel] No valid model given!";
00287                         return (false);
00288                 }
00289                 }
00290                 return (true);
00291         }
00292 
00296         inline void initSACMethod(const int method_type) {
00297 
00298                 switch (method_type) {
00299                 case SAC_ALMeDS: {
00300                         cout<<"[initSAC] Using a method of type: SAC_ALMeDS with a model threshold of "<<threshold<<endl;
00301                         if (sacMethod == 0){
00302                                 sacMethod = new SACMethodALMeDS();
00303                         }
00304                         sacMethod->setObjectModel(objectModel);
00305                         sacMethod->setDistanceThreshold(threshold);
00306                         sacMethod->setPointCloud(inputPointCloud);
00307                         break;
00308                 }
00309                 case SAC_RANSAC:
00310                 {
00311                         cout<< "[SAC Segmentation] Using a method of type: SAC_RANSAC_ROS with a model threshold of "<<threshold<<endl;
00312                         if (sacMethod == 0){
00313                                 sacMethod = new SACMethodRANSAC();
00314                         }
00315                         sacMethod->setObjectModel(objectModel);
00316                         sacMethod->setDistanceThreshold(threshold);
00317                         sacMethod->setPointCloud(inputPointCloud);
00318                         break;
00319                 }
00320                 case SAC_LMEDS: {
00321                         cout<<"[SAC Segmentation] Using a method of type: SAC_LMeDS_ROS with a model threshold of "<<threshold<<endl;
00322                         if (sacMethod == 0){
00323                                 sacMethod = new SACMethodLMeDS();
00324                         }
00325                         sacMethod->setObjectModel(objectModel);
00326                         sacMethod->setDistanceThreshold(threshold);
00327                         sacMethod->setPointCloud(inputPointCloud);
00328                         break;
00329                 }
00330                 case SAC_MSAC: {
00331                         cout<<"[SAC Segmentation] Using a method of type: SAC_MSAC_ROS with a model threshold of "<<threshold<<endl;
00332                         if (sacMethod == 0){
00333                                 sacMethod = new SACMethodMSAC();
00334                         }
00335                         sacMethod->setObjectModel(objectModel);
00336                         sacMethod->setDistanceThreshold(threshold);
00337                         sacMethod->setPointCloud(inputPointCloud);
00338                         break;
00339                 }
00340                 case SAC_MLESAC: {
00341                         cout<<"[SAC Segmentation] Using a method of type: SAC_MLESAC_ROS with a model threshold of "<<threshold<<endl;
00342                         if (sacMethod == 0){
00343                                 sacMethod = new SACMethodMLESAC();
00344                         }
00345                         sacMethod->setObjectModel(objectModel);
00346                         sacMethod->setDistanceThreshold(threshold);
00347                         sacMethod->setPointCloud(inputPointCloud);
00348                         break;
00349                 }
00350                 }
00351                 // Set the Sample Consensus parameters if they are given/changed
00352                 if (sacMethod->getProbability() != probability) {
00353                         cout<<"[SAC Segmentation] Setting the desired probability to "<< this->probability<<endl;
00354                         sacMethod->setProbability(probability);
00355                 }
00356 
00357                 if (maxIterations!= -1 && sacMethod->getMaxIterations()
00358                                 != maxIterations) {
00359                         cout<<"[SAC Segmentation] Setting the maximum number of iterations to "<<maxIterations<<endl;
00360                         sacMethod->setMaxIterations(maxIterations);
00361                 }
00362         }
00363 
00364 
00369         int
00370         segment ()
00371         {
00372                 assert(this->inputPointCloud != 0);
00373 
00374                 // Initialize the Sample Consensus model and set its parameters
00375                 if (!initSACModel (modelType))
00376                 {
00377                         cout<<"[SAC Segmentation] Error initializing the SAC model!"<<endl;
00378                         return 0;
00379                 }
00380 
00381                 // Initialize the Sample Consensus method and set its parameters
00382                 //if (sacMethod == 0){
00383                         initSACMethod(SACMethodType);
00384                 //}
00385 
00386                 //Compute the model
00387 
00388                 if (!sacMethod->computeModel())
00389                 {
00390                         cout<<"[SAC Segmentation] Error segmenting the model! No solution found"<<endl;
00391                 }
00392 
00393 
00394                 // Get the model inliers
00395                 sacMethod->getInliers(inliers);
00396 
00397 
00398                 // Get the model coefficients
00399                 sacMethod->getModelCoefficients (this->modelCoefficients);
00400 
00401                 return 1;
00402 
00403         }
00404 };
00405 }
